page_1.by_signing_up: By signing up, you accept our <u>Terms of Use</u> and <u>Privacy Policy</u>.

page_2.our_goal: Our goal is to eliminate the hassle of localization by providing tools to automate, integrate and better manage your translations. Lokalise is a better way for growth-oriented companies to expand their mobile apps, games, software or digital content into \n multiple languages.
